pageContent: Purpose: We investigated the potential for improvement in disease control by use of autologous peripheral blood stem cell transplant (PBSCT) to permit administration of high activities of (186)Re-hydroxyethylidene diphosphonate (HEDP) in patients with progressive hormone-refractory prostate cancer (HRPC).

metaData.source:
Epidemiology of prostatitis: new evidence for a world-wide problem
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12712363/
